jules_workforce_alpha.description: Update all dox-admin memory banks and optimize project memory for enhanced Jules learning

task_parameters.task_description: Analyze and optimize all dox-admin memory banks, update status tracking systems, and enhance project memory architecture for optimal Jules AI learning and knowledge retention
task_parameters.title: Memory & Status Optimization Specialist

expected_deliverables: Optimized memory-banks/ structure with enhanced indexing
Updated SUPERVISOR.json with AI-enhanced coordination capabilities
Enhanced CONTINUITY_MEMORY.md with Jules learning patterns
Optimized status tracking for AI worker coordination
Knowledge base optimization for faster Jules onboarding

jules_workforce_beta.description: Update dox-admin project site with fresh Jules integration content and comprehensive documentation

task_parameters.task_description: Update dox-admin project documentation, README files, and project site with comprehensive Jules MCP integration content, AI capabilities overview, and enhanced governance documentation
task_parameters.title: Project Site Enhancement Specialist

expected_deliverables: Updated README.md with Jules integration overview
Enhanced project documentation with AI capabilities
Updated AGENTS.md with AI-powered protocols
Fresh governance documentation reflecting AI integration
Comprehensive API documentation for Jules tools

jules_workforce_gamma.description: Add Jules learning and optimization to continuance system for permanent memory retention across sessions

task_parameters.task_description: Enhance the continuance system to integrate Jules AI learning patterns, optimize knowledge retention across sessions, and create persistent memory structures for AI worker coordination
task_parameters.title: Continuance Integration Specialist

expected_deliverables: Enhanced CONTINUITY_MEMORY.md with AI learning patterns
Persistent knowledge structures for Jules sessions
Cross-session memory optimization for AI workers
Automated learning capture and retention systems
Knowledge base continuity across worker deployments

jules_workforce_delta.description: Analyze all 22+ PACT services for optimization opportunities and create comprehensive improvement recommendations

task_parameters.task_description: Comprehensive analysis of all 22+ PACT platform services to identify optimization opportunities, architectural improvements, and create detailed recommendations for enhanced performance and maintainability
task_parameters.title: PACT Platform Analysis Specialist

expected_deliverables: Comprehensive service analysis report
Optimization recommendations for all 22 services
Architectural improvement suggestions
Performance bottleneck identification
Integration optimization strategies
